statements: SELECT * FROM remote_sensing_metadata
SELECT image_name, image_date, sensor_type FROM remote_sensing_metadata
SELECT image_id, image_name, resolution FROM remote_sensing_metadata ORDER BY image_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM remote_sensing_metadata
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM remote_sensing_metadata WHERE dataset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT image_name, sensor_type FROM remote_sensing_metadata ORDER BY image_date DESC, resolution ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM remote_sensing_metadata WHERE sensor_type = 'Lidar' AND resolution > 2.5
SELECT image_name, image_date FROM remote_sensing_metadata WHERE dataset_id = 'f18aea07-26d4-44d4-a9e9-93464d1d59a5' ORDER BY image_name
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_date FROM remote_sensing_metadata WHERE resolution BETWEEN 1.5 AND 3.0 ORDER BY image_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM remote_sensing_metadata WHERE image_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM remote_sensing_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_url, capture_date FROM remote_sensing_images WHERE resolution = 'High';
SELECT dataset_name, description FROM remote_sensing_datasets WHERE dataset_id = 3;
SELECT id, image_url, capture_date, resolution FROM remote_sensing_images;
SELECT * FROM remote_sensing_datasets WHERE created_on > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM remote_sensing_images WHERE resolution='High' ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT id, image_url, resolution FROM remote_sensing_images WHERE capture_date>'2021-01-01' ORDER BY image_url ASC;
SELECT dataset_name, description FROM remote_sensing_datasets WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM remote_sensing_images JOIN remote_sensing_datasets ON remote_sensing_images.id = remote_sensing_datasets.dataset_id;
SELECT id, capture_date, image_url FROM remote_sensing_images WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2021-03-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_name, image_type FROM images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT dataset_name FROM datasets WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, dataset_name, dataset_size FROM datasets ORDER BY dataset_size DESC;
SELECT image_name, dataset_name FROM images JOIN image_datasets ON images.id = image_datasets.image_id JOIN datasets ON image_datasets.dataset_id = datasets.id;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_type = 'png';
SELECT id, image_name FROM images WHERE capture_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM datasets WHERE dataset_size > 1000;
SELECT image_name, dataset_name FROM images JOIN image_datasets ON images.id = image_datasets.image_id JOIN datasets ON datasets.id = image_datasets.dataset_id;
SELECT dataset_name, COUNT(image_id) AS image_count FROM datasets JOIN image_datasets ON datasets.id = image_datasets.dataset_id GROUP BY dataset_name ORDER BY image_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM remote_sensing_images;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM remote_sensing_images WHERE image_size > 1000;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_description FROM remote_sensing_datasets ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT image_name, image_tags.tag_name FROM remote_sensing_images JOIN image_tags ON remote_sensing_images.id = image_tags.image_id;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size FROM remote_sensing_datasets WHERE dataset_size < 5000 ORDER BY dataset_size ASC;
SELECT * FROM remote_sensing_images
SELECT image_name, image_size FROM remote_sensing_images WHERE capture_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size FROM remote_sensing_datasets ORDER BY dataset_size DESC
SELECT rs.image_name, it.tag_name FROM remote_sensing_images rs JOIN image_tags it ON rs.id = it.image_id
SELECT rs.image_name, ds.dataset_name FROM remote_sensing_images rs JOIN dataset_tags dt ON rs.id = dt.dataset_id JOIN remote_sensing_datasets ds ON dt.dataset_id = ds.dataset_id
SELECT name, resolution, capture_date FROM images;
SELECT id, name, description, last_updated_date FROM datasets;
SELECT id, tag_name FROM image_tags WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM dataset_images WHERE dataset_id = 2;
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM image_metadata WHERE image_id = 3;
SELECT id, name, resolution FROM images ORDER BY resolution DESC;
SELECT name, capture_date FROM images WHERE resolution > 2000;
SELECT * FROM image_tags WHERE tag_name = 'nature' ORDER BY image_id ASC;
SELECT images.name, image_tags.tag_name FROM images JOIN image_tags ON images.id = image_tags.image_id;

SELECT datasets.name AS dataset_name, COUNT(dataset_images.image_id) AS image_count FROM datasets JOIN dataset_images ON datasets.id = dataset_images.dataset_id GROUP BY datasets.name ORDER BY image_count DESC;
